data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sepahvand, Vahid, Momtazi, Farzaneh, Tudge, Christopher (2015): Cheramus iranicus, a new species of ghost shrimp (Decapoda: Axiidea: Callianassidae) from the Persian Gulf, Iran. Zootaxa 4040 (2): 215-224, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.2.7
